pr_title: Better errors for missing IDs in Patch Extension Request. (#1278)

timeline.message:
Better errors for missing IDs in Patch Extension Request. (#1278)

* Return a better error when handling invalid patch extension requests that are missing IDs

* Added tests

Co-authored-by: Aaron Klish <klish@verizonmedia.com>

timeline.bodyText: @aklish any idea why detail is now treated as an array here?
timeline.author: wcekan

replies.bodyText: That might be a bug.  I checked JSON-API spec - and I think that should just be a string.
replies.author: aklish

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I suspect it might be processed as
(errors[0].detail)[0] due to the outer and inner arrays.
replies.author: wcekan
